name: Public enemy (wajdipro)
description:
Public Enemy is a third person shooter game with more than 25 missions , 10 achievements ,more than 15 items to buy like a jetpack , , clothes, weapons..
Public Enemy move on your feet or drive any vehicle you want from taxi to police car to tank ...
You are playing as Mister X which is known in the media by Public Enemy . He is against the corruption in his country. Take control and help him achieving his goals ...Destroy everything, enemies, buildings, vehicle and armors ... Be sure to collect as much as possible of money and health care package...
Check the shop and unlock power gadgets and weapons. You can always earn 100K % dollars with a reward video.
The game is also available for free in the google store so download it now and live the adventure and the actions
